casebody.data:
Jeffrey WORKMAN, Appellant
v.
SUPERINTENDENT ALBION SCI; District Attorney Philadelphia; Attorney General Pennsylvania No. 16-1969 United States Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Dated: October 30, 2018 SUR PETITION FOR PANEL REHEARING The petition for rehearing filed by appellees in the above-entitled case having been submitted to the judges who participated in the decision of this Court, it is hereby ORDERED that the petition for rehearing by the panel is granted. The opinion and judgment entered September 11, 2018 are hereby VACATED. 1 A subsequent opinion and judgment will be issued.

As the merits panel has vacated the prior opinion and judgment, action is not required by the en banc court.

BY THE COURT,

/s/ Julio M. Fuentes

Circuit Judge
